alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 7:51AM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches, with locally up to 14 inches in the Orderville and Glendale areas as well as near the Mount Carmel-Zion Tunnel. * WHERE...Zion National Park and South Central Utah. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected including SR- 9 through Zion National Park and US-89 to Kanab.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: South Central Utah; Zion National Park
